gobblin.password

Class PasswordManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.password.PasswordManager

  • public class PasswordManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for managing password encryption and decryption. To encrypt or decrypt a password, a master password should be provided which is used as encryption or decryption key.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String decryptPassword(java.lang.String encrypted)
      Decrypt an encrypted password.
      java.lang.String encryptPassword(java.lang.String plain)
      Encrypt a password.
      static PasswordManager getInstance()
      Get an instance with no master password, which cannot encrypt or decrypt passwords.
      static PasswordManager getInstance(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path masterPwdLoc)
      Get an instance.
      static PasswordManager getInstance(java.util.Properties props)
      Get an instance.
      static PasswordManager getInstance(State state)
      Get an instance.
      static com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.String> getMasterPassword(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path masterPwdLoc) 
      java.lang.String readPassword(java.lang.String password)
      Decrypt a password if it is an encrypted password (in the form of ENC(.*)), and a master password has been provided in the constructor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PasswordManager getInstance()
        Get an instance with no master password, which cannot encrypt or decrypt passwords.

      • getInstance

        public static PasswordManager getInstance(State state)
        Get an instance. The location of the master password file is provided via "encrypt.key.loc".

      • getInstance

        public static PasswordManager getInstance(java.util.Properties props)
        Get an instance. The location of the master password file is provided via "encrypt.key.loc".

      • getInstance

        public static PasswordManager getInstance(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path masterPwdLoc)
        Get an instance. The master password file is given by masterPwdLoc.

      • encryptPassword

        public java.lang.String encryptPassword(java.lang.String plain)
        Encrypt a password. A master password must have been provided in the constructor.
        Parameters:
        plain - A plain password to be encrypted.
        Returns:
        The encrypted password.

      • decryptPassword

        public java.lang.String decryptPassword(java.lang.String encrypted)
        Decrypt an encrypted password. A master password must have been provided in the constructor.
        Parameters:
        encrypted - An encrypted password.
        Returns:
        The decrypted password.

      • readPassword

        public java.lang.String readPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Decrypt a password if it is an encrypted password (in the form of ENC(.*)), and a master password has been provided in the constructor. Otherwise, return the password as is.

      • getMasterPassword

        public static com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.String> getMasterPassword(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path masterPwdLoc)
